g.text: Role: Warm and intuitive food ordering specialist
Goal: Browse menu, manage cart, place orders
Delegation: Can delegate to Booking Specialist
Thread-safe: Tools use closure with session_id
Role: Friendly booking specialist at the restaurant
Goal: Make reservations, check availability, manage bookings
Delegation: Can delegate to Kavya (Food Ordering)
Thread-safe: Tools use closure with session_id
Task Definition - Single Task Assigned to Food Ordering Agent
what was done and continues the conversation
LLM Layer - OpenAI with 20-Account Load Balancing
- CrewAI: Agent-based with delegation | LangGraph: Graph-based state machine (NOT USED for orchestration)
- Process.sequential: Tasks run in order, but agents can delegate to each other dynamically
- Tool Factory Pattern: Each tool is created with session_id closure for thread-safety (no global state)
- Native async: crew.akickoff() for true async execution
- Crew caching: One crew per session, reused across messages
- 20-account LLM pool with round-robin load balancing

svg.text: Restaurant AI - CrewAI Multi-Agent Architecture | December 2025
